law.catch_line: The Board consists of the following 22 members:...

section.section: The term of an appointed member is 5 years.
The terms of appointed members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Board on October 1, 2001.
At the end of a term, an appointed member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: The Governor may remove a member for incompetence or misconduct.
The Governor or the Governor's designee shall serve as chairman.
